title: Print, "Grand Hotel, Cairo", 20th century
markings: Stamp in purple ink, verso: Per. Ind. FERRI FERNANDO / Via Sportini, 1 / FERMO (AsP.) Italia; stamp in purple ink, verso: Dr. Azevedo Pereira / coleccionador collectionneur / Cam [...] Peq[...]o, 57-1o-D. / LISBOA – Portugal –
creditline: Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund
description: Luggage label with a multi-story hotel in the foreground and golden pyramids in the distance. Palm trees, a fishing boat on water, and a figure carrying a basket on her head occupy the middleground. Text in black, upper right, in Arabic letters; in white on green background, in lower margin: CAIRO / GRAND HOTEL.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Grand Hotel, Cairo", 20th century.
20th century. Offset lithograph. Museum purchase from Sarah Cooper-Hewitt Fund. 1994-62-45.
